entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET Framework 3.5 images for Windows Server 2025 will no longer be published after May 13th #349

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update the AspNetCore.slnf solution to the new SLNX format #61269
  • Perf regression: json, multiple_queries, updates #61267
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, kestrel-encoded-url, multiple_queries #61266
  • [OpenAPI] Cannot skip SecurityScheme for controllers with [AllowAnonymous] #61264
  • OpenApi doc generation throws when using length annotations on a nullable dictionary #61259
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #61257
  • Perf regression: updates #61256

Closed

  • Consider making native build more fine-grained #59865
    .NET 10 Planning
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.dll file version downgrade between 8.0.7 and 8.0.8 #57563
    10.0-preview1
  • Enable Artifact Signing on macOS and Linux #59766
  • Perf improvement: httpsys-encoded-url #61238
  • Perf improvement: https #61248
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.AzureAppServices.SiteExtension missing content/Microsoft.Web.Xdt.Extensions.dll #61187
  • AspNetCoreRuntime.10.0.x64/x86 nupkgs - Missing the aspnetcore shared runtime #61185

PullRequests

Created

  • Make PublishAllBuildsAssetsInThisJob available in Signing.props #61271
    area-infrastructure
  • Ensure project.assets.json files are unique for SiteExtensions in VMR #61270
    area-infrastructure
  • Add host.docker.internal and host.containers.internal to the dev cert SAN #61265
    area-commandlinetools
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `24a9e94` to `52204f7` #61261
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `24a9e94` to `52204f7` #61260
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Sign Mariner rpms with Mariner cert #61262
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump actions/setup-node from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 #61067
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview4
  • Set PackageProjectUrl #61188
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Fix missing VMR assets in SiteExtensions packages #61233
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25180.3 #61244
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add InvokeNew, GetValue & SetValue to JS interop API #61246
    area-blazor
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Generate Link headers based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #61166
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • Rename MapSchemasEndoints.cs to MapSchemasEndpoints.cs #61073
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cleanup code around experimental features that are no longer experimental (e.g. vector search for cosmos) #35886
    10.0.0
  • Can't subquery a view on SQL Server #35885
  • EF Core 10 release checklist #35884
    10.0.0
  • Support materialization interceptor for complex types #35883
    Backlog
  • Many to many relationship with date composite key returns duplicate results. #35882
  • Comparison with DateTime.MaxValue fails #35881

Closed

  • EF Core 9 release checklist #32915
    9.0.0
  • EF Core InMemory database throws an argument exception on Nullable<>.ToString #35299
    10.0.0
  • EFCore 8.0.13 Linq query using Enum.GetValues().Cast<int>() fails #35777
    10.0.0
  • Unexpected behavior of split query with non-trivial projection #35878

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #35299 - EF Core InMemory database throws an argument exception on Nullable<>.ToString #35763
  • Fix casted collections of enums as primitive collections. #35839
  • Fix comment #35880

Updated

  • Cosmos Full Text Search support #35868

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TJ Test Issue #28739
  • Remove `Compatibility.Layout` as a subclass of all modern .NET MAUI controls #28736
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • An activity indicator in a collectionview header is not displayed #28732
  • [iOS] Maui Blazor white screen #28727
  • [Windows] ImagePaint is not rendering in View #28725
  • IsEnabled does not work in BackButtonBehavior #28722
  • C1-Using the mouse wheel to quickly scroll the page does not jump normally #28721

Closed

  • Android not allowing AbsoluteLayout/VerticalStackLayout Height and Width to be set properly (working on iOS/Windows) #17883
    Backlog
  • HybridWebView: no response is recieved if there is an exception in an async javascript function, invoked from dotnet #28738
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps.Map crashes example app #28718
  • Could not find a valid Xcode app bundle #28688
  • Not a Bug - .Net Maui compilation fails on paired mac #28686
  • Random error (System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException (0x8001010E)) when executing or trying to hot reload MAUI Blazor Hybrid Application #27827
  • [iOS] ViewCell not resized when HasUnevenRows is enabled and cell content changes #23319
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add back TextTransformUtilites #28735
    p/0, area-controls-general, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [iOS] BackButtonBehavior IsEnabled - fix #28734
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #28728
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [MaciOS] Fixed NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint #28726
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [main] [net10.0] [ci] Fix naming of workloads #28742
  • [net10.0] [ci] Fix naming of workloads #28741
  • [ci] Fix naming of workloads #28740
    area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net10.0] [ci] Fix variable _UploadPathRoot #28731
  • [main] [net10.0] [ci] Fix variable _UploadPathRoot #28733
  • Fixed iOS cell resizing issue #23319 #28690
    community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [ci] Fix variable _UploadPathRoot #28730
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [ci] Fix publish zip for insertions #28724
    area-infrastructure
  • [net10.0] [ci] try publish the zip #28723

Updated

  • [iOS] Support for KeepLastItemInView for CV2 #28720
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Fix iOS CollectionView not reacting properly to orientation changes #28670
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [ci] Make sure we can run everything on arm64 machines #28551
    area-infrastructure, testing-infrastructure
  • [Android] Shell BackButtonBehavior binding Command to valid ICommand causes back button to disappear #28132
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [xamlc] convert {OnPlatform} to OnPlatformExtension<T> #28700
  • [iOS] Fixed NavigationStack not updating when OnAppearing is invoked #28666
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • BindableLayout should dispatch layout changes when collection changes from background thread #24714
    area-layout, do-not-merge, community ✨
  • Fixed Footer not displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView in CV2 #28681
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView EmptyView Feature #28679
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix Crash When Using FlyoutItem with DataTemplate and Binding #28683
    area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 6 #28399
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Shapes BackgroundColor invalidation #27398
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • ScrollView's ScrollToAsync doesn't complete when called thrice with the same value #27300
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [NET10] Add global resources and configuration method #28649
    area-xaml, area-core-hosting, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: implement support for user-defined compound operators #77955
  • EnC: implement support for runtime async #77954
  • EnC: implement support for extensions #77953
  • EnC: implement support for simple lambda parameters with modifiers #77952
  • EnC: implement support for field keyword in property accessors #77951
  • EnC: detect changes in code that only runs once and need to force restart #77949
  • IbcMerge failing because MS.CA.dll is used by another process #77941
  • Extension everything clean up translated prototype comments #77933
    Next

Closed

  • Change Signature broken when using Primary Constructors #75676
  • Expose Hot Reload functionality for third-party tools #73543
    18.0
  • Update 'use collection expr' fixer to support key-value-pairs/dictionaries. #77922
  • Roslyn compiler hangs during TeamCity build with 'Request rejected: Failed to connect to server' error #77893
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35931.46 #77930

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge features/dictionary-expressions into release/dev17.14 #77961
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Change SolutionState._lazyFilePathToRelatedDocumentIds to a ConcurrentDictionary #77959
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update `RuntimeHelpers.Await` rules #77957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update resourceManagement.yml #77948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support converting a dictionary to a dictionary-expr when the target is a supported interface #77945
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Parse compound assignment operator declarations #77943
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Extensions: misc checks on receiver parameter and extension members #77937
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Ensure we don't put as an input to the VSIX build outputs #77960
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add an Ide.slnf that excludes RoslynAnalzyers #77958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.14 into features/dictionary-expressions #77947
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Add a fix for Change Signature breaking with Primary Constructors #77950
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [main] Avoid ApplyOptimizations if up to date #77944
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update null-conditional assignment feature status #77921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid ApplyOptimizations if up to date #77942
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/dev17.15' => 'main' #77939
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode, Next
  • Detect regular method vs. operator mismatch during overriding and interface implementation #77885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Support using k:v syntax when converting collection expressions. #77931
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: disallow collection arguments for `[CollectionBuilder]` types #77924
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Snap 17.14p3 (update config) #77936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Snap 17.14p3 (merge `main` commits to `release/dev17.14`) #77935
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Semantic Search: Add support for async queries and FAR tool #77906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Ensure that newline is inserted after file scoped namespace declarations #77821
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, breaking-change
  • Extensions: update feature status #77923
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: all diag analyzer work. #77881
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix EA layering for Razor.ExternalAccess #77927
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type #77899
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: Remove source generator diagnostic reporting from Workspace #76863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add stubs for semantic model apis needed by IDE #77448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reduce main thread switches in VisualStudioProjectFactory.CreateAndAddToWorkspaceAsync #77920
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Execute core compiler from full framework msbuild #77914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] CI flakiness: App fails to start in time and gets killed #114132
  • [PERF] Occasionally hitting CryptographicException on performance CI runs #114129
  • TaskScheduler.UnobservedTaskException catches quic exceptions with kestrel combined with grpc + http3 #114128
  • Getting sddl string for ACLS with ACEs having Conditional Access Policy #114127
  • CI flakiness: mono interpreter build getting killed #114123
  • [wasm][interpreter] PackedSimd.IsSupported is false until the app is trimmed #114122
    10.0.0
  • App WPF .NET 9.0.3 x64 portable error WMI in Windows 8.1 #114118
  • ConfigurableArrayPool shoud use GC.AllocateUninitializedArray<T> #114116
  • System.IO.Packaging - net8 - Package.Flush not flushing all data #114114
  • EventInfo.EventHandlerType.GetMethod("Invoke") could be made trim safe #114113
  • Exclude generic types with parameters that do not satisfy constraints #114109
  • How to create a symmetrical JSON class for reading and writing that is intuitive with [JsonExtensionData]? #114106
  • Custom Numeric Format String Rounds Erroneously #114104
  • `JsonElement` properties do not support `JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull` #114102
    Future
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder generates invalid IL #114097
  • [wasm coreclr] do not run finalizers on separate thread #114096
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 8 Regressions on 3/24/2025 9:53:02 PM +00:00 #114112
  • Issue with Retrieving Supported Cultures via DI in Blazor WebAssembly #114099
  • [API Proposal]: StringBuilder.AppendJoin but instead of Select'ing values use StringBuilder itself #114095
  • Unexpected `Vector3` sum on Android #114094
  • Native AOT: Re-order method bodies using PGO data #114093
    10.0.0
  • How to deal "unresolved class" with analysis the mlpd file? #114092

Closed

  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 System.Collections.Tests.Perf_BitArray Regression on 3/18/2025 4:15:54 PM +00:00 #113934
    10.0.0
  • Incorrect comment and maybe missed-optimization in src/coreclr/jit/codegenlinear.cpp for LoongArch & RISC-V #113565
    10.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-10.0.100-preview.3.25174.5] Failed to build the retargeted paint.net with CS0104 and CS8377 #114115
  • Test failure: Loader/ExternalAssemblyProbe/ExternalAssemblyProbe/ExternalAssemblyProbe.cmd #113117
  • [API Proposal]: Tensor.LengthsAsInt/Long #111963
    10.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity out of proc monitoring can't access Activity Events or Links #102924
    10.0.0
  • [WASI] core module exports #113868
    Future
  • [APX-REX2] Left-over TODOs after REX2 encoding changes #110414
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 21 Regressions on 12/3/2024 10:12:58 PM #110581
    10.0.0
  • Assert failure '!CREATE_CHECK_STRING(bSmallObjectHeapPtr || bLargeObjectHeapPtr)' #111922
    10.0.0
  • Snap engineering debt #62241
    Future
  • Missing instruction on installing 5.0 dotnet core on Ubuntu machine. #60440
    Future
  • [snap] dotnet tools like "ef" not working. #60441
    Future
  • snap for 3.1.300 does not create needed symlink #60442
    Future
  • Will arm be supported on snap in the future? #60443
    Future
  • Couldn't find a valid ICU package installed on the system. #60439
    Future
  • I received the Command 'dotnet' not found, but can be installed with error #60438
    Future
  • dotnet watch run - failed to start #60437
    Future
  • Snap : Issue with Running .NET Core 3.1 applications on Ubuntu 20.10 or 20.04 #60435
    Future
  • cannot run dotnet-sdk (.NET 5.0.400 (latest)) without root privileges (installed with snap) #57481
    Future
  • Segmentation fault #60436
    Future
  • Ubuntu 21.04 - dotnet will not start without sudo #60434
    Future
  • Allow us to install multiple .NET SDKs through snap #62252
    Future
  • Segmentation fault on Pop OS and Manjaro #60642
    Future
  • Console.WriteLine no longer outputs to the screen on Ubuntu 20.04 after upgrading to .NET version 6.0 #61468
    Future
  • Can not run apps by snap install dotnet-runtime-60 #62091
    Future
  • Relocation error when app is run from terminal, but works correctly from VS Code debug session #63418
    Future
  • .Net Core 3.1 GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined #69467
    Future
  • symbol __pthread_key_create version GLIBC_2.2.5 not defined in file libpthread.so.0 with link time reference #78931
    Future
  • [.NET Tutorial]: Tutorial: Get started with ASP.NET Core #65970
    Future
  • Segmentation fault (core dumped) while using dotnet #67465
    Future
  • Segmenation fault on dotnet new console build and run #76117
    Future
  • unable to make a dotnet app it says Segmentation fault (core dumped) #76982
    Future
  • snap: dotnet-runtime-60: Console program crash during dynamic linker due to "librt.so.1: undefined symbol: __clock_nanosleep" #77440
    Future
  • snap: dotnet-sdk 7.0: Output console program crash during dynamic linker if target net7.0 (snap specific) #77442
    Future
  • Problem with GLIBC_2.34 on Ubuntu.22.04-x64 #89471
  • Segmentation fault when binary is located in certain path - snap installation in Ubuntu #96425
  • Hang with `HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering = false` in .NET 9 #113398
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add RSA-PSS signature validation with custom salt length OR expose RsaBcryptSafeHandle #114061
  • System.Net.Security.Tests timing out in the CI #114004
  • Support Windows 10 for System.Net.Quic #101200
    Future
  • Timeout in WasmTestOnChrome-ST-System.Text.Encodings.Web.Tests #113492

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove specific AZL sign certs #114131
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: stop tracking TYP_I_IMPL locals in escape analysis #114130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace use of DAMT.All in ComponentModel with a more restricted set #114126
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix bug in hwintrinsicxarch.cpp for Shuffle methods on xarch #114125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code in ExceptionTracker and leftover old EH code #114121
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement breakpoint disassembly support for Intel APX #114120
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, apx
  • [release/9.0-staging][mono][hotreload]Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #114119
    area-EnC-mono
  • [PERF][Android] Setup Android sample app for AOT/R2R perf testing #114117
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [wasm coreclr] simplify build #114111
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • Add support for importing encrypted PKCS#8 to ML-KEM #114108
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Notify profiler about unloads of all class instances when module is unloaded #114107
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix llvm-libunwind context sizes #114105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix discrepancy between HttpRequest/ResponseMessage.ToString and HttpHeaders.ToString #114101
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix SslStreamDisposeTest for parallel handshake on Unix #114100
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Dev/rokonec/101022 httplistner mem leak #114098
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • Parallel change to the diagnostic update for GC Info decoder. #113888
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Share some CEEJitInfo methods with the CInterpreterInfo #114110
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Give more detail on RyuJIT porting #108080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Change FrameIdentifiers to be contract literals #113953
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm][interp] Match more Vector intrinsics to PackedSimd intrinsics #114070
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: expose inline budget as a jit config option #114103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Move DAC signing identity to PME #114031
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • remove the switch to fallback to old EH #114018
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Don't pass stack pointer in ECX on x86 funclet ABI #113792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stackwalk support for interpreted frames #113900
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Adjust additional source under utilcode and vm to use minipal_log API. #113916
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix handling of empty RUNTIME_FUNCTIONs sections in R2R #114091
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Support Activity Events and Links trace out of proc output #113905
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 10.0.0
  • [APX] Revert some unexpected code removal. #113898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Fix syslog format error on Windows. #114009
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [cDAC] Remove superfluous modifiers from contract interfaces #113983
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [debugger] Fix debugging a x86 app in mixed mode #114075
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix Hang on when GetRequestStreamAsync #113409
    area-System.Net
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • ML-KEM: PKCS#8 Import #114086
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 134.0.6998.165, windows: 135.0.7049.41 #114042
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Make COR_PRF_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATIONS Allowable After Attach and non immutable #113924
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix crossgen2 sometimes emitting tokens from the wrong module into R2R output #114029
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][interpreter] Make nint and nuint work for interpreter simd intrinsics #114087
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Sign and harden pkgs #114027
    needs-area-label
  • Update dotnet-sos version #113240
    needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr
  • TypeMap API (Dynamic implementation) #113954
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Support passing global string values #114085
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Block inlines with different exception wrapping behavior #113849
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] [hotreload] Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #113995
    area-EnC-mono
  • Enhance logging of stubs through the PerfMap on Linux #113943
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Partial unfolding of the loop generated in genZeroInitFrameUsingBlockInit and simplification of jump encoding #114003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [infra][apple-mobile] Migrate Apple mobile jobs to `osx.15.[amd/arm64].open` queues #113313
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [browser] profilers linking and instrumentation in AOT #114080
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Propagate flow into finally regions correctly in synthesis #114016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Draft : Reduce TP regression in allocateRegistersMinimal() #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Some issues with preserving value of a nullable struct with mix of ref/value fields across a suspension point. #3043

PullRequests

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Clean up and document JIT parts #3063

Merged

  • [Shipping] Publish StoreKit bindings as NuGet packages and run device tests #3040
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Implement Swift native handle as `SafeHandle` #3052
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • redist.csproj isn't building incrementally #48070
  • Microsoft.DotNet.SDK.8 - "No applicable installer found" when using scope=machine #48066
  • `dotnet list package` does not work when specifying solution #48062
  • [MAC]The template packages for .NET 10 Preview 3 is incorrect #48061
  • Verify if `dotnet test` for MTP should propagate DOTNET_ROOT similar to dotnet run #48060

Closed

  • NETSDK1064: Package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Analyzers, version 7.0.2 was not found #39163
  • Update tests to accommodate https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/9748 #39266
  • Progress description truncated in Dotnet SDK Installer #41079
  • SDK product construction is broken when aspnetcore moves ahead of runtime #47070
  • Generated AssemblyAttributes.cs should be subject to clean #21304
    Backlog
  • Please add `--source` to dotnet tool install #21355
  • `dotnet publish --self-contained false --no-build` creates runtimeconfig with includedframework #21459
  • Publish Debian packages for arm32 and arm64 to packages.microsoft.com #21447
  • WorkloadManifest.json files in the SDK incorrectly have execute permissions #21426
    Backlog
  • [Windows ARM64] with 3.1.408 SDK installed, Run project, Waring occurs--warning MSB3088: Could not read state file "obj\Debug\netcoreapp3.1\testagin.csprojAssemblyReference.cache". Unspecified error (0x80004005 (E_FAIL)) #16220
    Backlog
  • ClickOnce Publish Failure - library not found #15667
    Backlog
  • Dotnet build is not able to map normalized TFMs #46947
  • Absolute or relative paths to .sln no longer works with `dotnet sln add` #47008
  • Current `dotnet.config` implementation violates TOML spec #48009
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • tool-install: Support package@version syntax #48085
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Javiercn/more cleanups #48082
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Test changes to validate SBRP cleanup #48078
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Nonfunctional code #48076
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add ux for retry in dotnet test #48075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reuse specific job artifacts in installer test jobs #48074
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #48067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet test for MTP] Throw exception if the project doesn't produce executable #48065
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Basic support for launchSettings in the new dotnet test #48063
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Added 30 to the width and X location to make sure there is room for the progress label #48043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix layout path for pkg files #48079
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in GeneratePackagePruneData #48030
    untriaged
  • Don't use colon in dotnet.config #48071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update baseline for VS redist assets #48040
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Tweak baseline based on newest build #48080
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only publish FSharp packages when needed #48033
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer job should fail if tests have failed #48015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert arm64 queue to MacOS 13 due to limited capacity #48044
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix using undefined property in GeneratePKG.targets #48059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48057
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify exit code logic for dotnet test (MTP) and consider no results correctly as "zero tests ran" #47874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • dotnet CLI: Adjust namespaces to match folder layout #48042
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • dotnet CLI: More cleanup via VS tools #47995
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update to the latest application insights #47924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve Post-Build Signing Validation in the VMR #47744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make it possible to prep other RIDs and architectures #47956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only set DotnetTool package type if no package type is set #48039
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Sign and harden pkgs #47996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move in-vertical manifest merging to new arcade package #47881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make all the properties in StaticWebAssetEndpoint lazy #47833
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [StaticWebAssets] Generate Link elements based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #47915
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • skip making archives for inner loop #47993
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve MTP dotnet test exit code messages #47979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Roslyn to parse directives in file-based programs #47978
